preparation.text: What you are feeling is an emotion like any other.
preparation.subphrase: It is intense, but it will not last forever.

preparation.text: Strong feelings don't require immediate action.
Your anger is valid, but acting on it right now may not help.

confrontation.text: Pause. You don't need to respond right now.
confrontation.subphrase: Grab an ice cube and hold it in your hand as long as you can.

confrontation.text: Take a slow breath before you do anything.
confrontation.subphrase: You can grab a pillow to scream into.

confrontation.text: Focus on your breathing. Let the heat pass.

reinforcement.text: You chose not to react impulsively.
You let the wave pass without letting it control you.
You can feel angry and still make good choices.
